history.proof: intros l1 l2 H. srun best use: permutation_all_permutations_aux, permutation_length unfold: all_permutations.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type l1, l2 : list A H : permutation l1 l2 Unable to unify "permutation ?M1416 ?M1417" with "(fix In (a : list A) (l : list (list A)) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) l1 (all_permutations l2)".
In environment A : Type l1, l2 : list A H : permutation l1 l2 Unable to unify "permutation l1 l2" with "In l1 (all_permutations l2)".

original: intros l1 l2 H. apply all_permutations_permutation. apply H.
